rule: illegal products or services
narcotics, steroids, certain controlled substances or other products that present a risk to consumer safety, products including THC, or any activity that relate to drug paraphernalia
electronic cigarettes related products
electronic items and devices
items that encourage, promote, facilitate or instruct others to engage in illegal activity
stolen goods including digital and virtual goods
cyber lookers, sharing and downloading portals

items that incites hate, any kind of discrimination, defamatory, bestiality, mutilation, violence, racial intolerance, are likely to harass any other person, or be in the financial exploitation of a crime
item related with depiction of sexual acts with persons being under the influence of intoxicating agents, hypnosis or with sleeping persons

items that are considered obscene, or sexually oriented materials or services, massage parlours, erotic live streams, erotic dance or comparable services, adult entertainment or pornography, including child pornography, sex clubs, prostitution, magazines, videos or images with pornographic content and sex toys
live animals or endangered animal species
connected to the selling of on package travel, package holidays and package tours as defined in the Council Directive 90/314/EEC
connected to services where the service provider collects money on behalf of others as a payment services provider, cheque encashment agencies, bureaux de change, money transmitters
virtual, digital or cryptocurrency activities, sale of vouchers, value cards or valuable usable chips
involving ammunition, explosives, arms, defence or weapons, replica weapons, gun parts or related parts or accessories, hunting, manufacture/distribution of weapons
the sale of travelers cheques or money orders, airline tickets, bus charters, hospitality timeshares, vacation pools, travel agencies, travel agent services or travel visas
promotion or advertising of products or services other than your own without appropriate authorisation

gambling, betting activities, casinos, lotteries, sweepstakes, penny auctions, services related to fantasy sports or sports forecasting, or sale of value usable chips or vouchers connected to this services, certain in-purchasing games
collecting money without license when compulsory in the account owners jurisdiction
multi-level marketing programs, matrix programs, outbound and inbound telemarketing or other similar programs
network sales or affiliates
programs, materials or services related to get-rich courses or related to increase your wealth or gambling
sale or distribution services based on offering telephone or chat services regarded as being of a sexual nature, escort services, adult entertainment or pornography
sub-acquiring or merchant aggregation
financial or escrow services, guarantees, mortgage

accounting, bookkeeping, company formation, private business directory or liquidation services, services related to auditing activities, proxy services, and law services specialized in warning letters
factoring, lending, investment services, pawn shops, pyramid and ponzi schemes

selling stocks, bonds, securities, options, futures, binary options or an investment interest in any entity or property, services related to raffles, debt consolidation, insurance brokers, payday lenders, medical collections, scholarship programs, payment protection insurance, currency exchange or FOREX activities
conveyancing or estate agency services;**
dating services
spiritual or worship services or products, astrology, fortune telling or palm reading
products or services related to the Second World War
jewels, precious metals and stones, wholesale of scrap metal, unregistered waste management businesses
sale of motor vehicles, auto parts, car accessories or auto services
bath salts, herbal products or potpourri blends
modification chips
payments to or from accounts in OFAC listed sanctioned countries
ticket agencies without a license, ticket resale
Prepaid phone cards
nail bar services
parking garages, storage warehouse services or any storage facilities
launderettes
replica clothes and products, or counterfeit goods

objectionable, offensive, indecent, harassing, threatening, embarrassing, distressing, vulgar, hateful, racially, ethnically or sexually offensive, or otherwise inappropriate behaviour towards the Holvi Payment Services Oy personnel
Surrogacy, and any other pregnancy or fertility related services/activities
Dropshipping and distribution companies
Highly rated politically exposed persons (PEP)
Businesses or businesses with persons suspected or convicted of terrorism and related offences
Business or businesses with persons subject to international/national sanctions
Providing false information relating to the customers identity or business activities
Businesses or businesses with persons associated with it that are suspected or convicted of financial crime or any other offence or action that carry a reputational risk
Journalism & newsgroups with offensive or content that involves or is distributed in hateful communities
church-like organizations or religious groups
charitable societies
night clubs, entertainment, selling of alcohol
political associations*
online pharmacy, healthcare, weight loss products, nutraceuticals
collecting money with or without a license
estate agency services
